## âœ… Checklist

<!-- Ensure all items are completed before requesting review -->

### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the project's [coding standards](../CONTRIBUTING.md)
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have added meaningful comments where the code is complex
- [ ] I have removed any debug console logs or unused code
- [ ] No new warnings have been generated

### Testing & Documentation

- [ ] I have tested my changes locally
- [ ] I have added tests where applicable (unit tests, integration tests, etc.)
- [ ] I have updated the documentation if needed
- [ ] Breaking changes are clearly documented

### Version Control & Compliance

- [ ] My branch is up to date with the base branch (`develop` or `main`)
- [ ] I have followed [Conventional Commits](../CONTRIBUTING.md#commit-messages) format
- [ ] I have linked the related issue (#ISSUE_NUMBER)
- [ ] My PR title is descriptive and follows naming conventions

### Functionality

- [ ] My changes do not break existing functionality
- [ ] All existing tests pass
- [ ] No console errors or warnings in browser (if frontend)
- [ ] All related APIs/endpoints are tested (if backend)
- [ ] Database migrations are included (if applicable)

### Compliance

- [ ] I have reviewed the [Code of Conduct](../CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md)
- [ ] My changes align with project standards
- [ ] No hardcoded credentials or sensitive data included
